verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: Earlier Thursday] , [ARGM-TMP: after weeks of planning and right - wing celebrating] , [ARG0: Donald Trump] [V: announced] [ARG1: that he was calling off the planned summit meeting with North Korea leader Kim Jong Un] .
